content: cozy cuffed mitts needles size 5 s i used my 8 addi circs yarn 160-180 yds dk or worsted weight blue handspun used 150 co 40 and join to knit in the round row 1-32 knit 2x2 ribbing about 4 row 33-40 knit row 41-61 thumb increases see below row 62 put 15 thumb stitches on waste yarn co 1 stitch backwards loop join and knit rest of round row 63-70 knit about 1 row 71-98 knit 2x2 ribbing for cuff on top about 3 1/2 bobble loosely i use size 7 needle k2togtbl thumb increases row 41 knit 20 pm m1r k1 m1l pm knit to end 3 thumb stitches row 42 43 45 46 48 49 51 52 54 55 57 58 60 61 knit row 44 47 50 53 56 59 knit to marker sm m1r knit to marker m1l sm knit to end increase row followed by 2 knit row giving you a total of 15 thumb stitches thumbs pu 15 thumb sts onto dpn s + a few more to close gaps next round knit but also decrease sts where you picked up from body k2tog down to 18 total sts knit stockinette for total of 11 row about 1 1/2 you could put some 2 x 2 ribbing at the top but i don t like the bulk on the thumb so opted for simple stockinette bobble loosely i use size 7 needle k2togtbl my hands are long and skinny and i knit tightly so make mods to fit your hands 
